manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the Steam Mop Replacement Pads, the perfect companion to your steam mop! These high-quality replacement pads are designed to fit most popular brands of steam mops such as Bissell, Shark, and more. Made of a durable microfiber material, these pads are designed to effectively clean and sanitize your floors without leaving any streaks or residue. They are machine washable, so you can reuse them multiple times and save money on replacement pads. With easy-to-attach Velcro strips, replacing the old pad with the new one is a breeze. The Steam Mop Replacement Pads are specifically designed for use on hard floors, including tile, hardwood, laminate, and more. They effectively remove dirt, dust, and grime, leaving your floors clean and hygienic. These replacement pads are also great for those with allergy sensitivities as they are designed to trap and lock in dust and allergens. Don't settle for dirty, dull floors. Upgrade your cleaning game with the Steam Mop Replacement Pads and experience a deeper clean with every use!

Steam Mop Head for Bissell Powerfresh 4 PC Top Quality Microfiber The pads with scrubbing strips work great on tough, stickier messes. Effective Cleaning Work well on floor such as: hardwood floors, laminate floors, ceramic tile, marble floors and other sealed hard floors. Machine Washable Just toss in the washing machine to renew the fiber and re-use! Let them air dry until you need them again. Safe for Floors Best for smooth surface floor, such as wooden floors, ceramic tile, laminate floors, marble floors and other sealed hard floors.

Perfectly fit Bissell Powerfresh Steam Mop Introducing our versatile steam mop pads that are specifically designed to fit a range of Bissell PowerFresh steam mop models. Compatible with the 1940 series, including 19402, 19404, 19408, 19409, 1940A, 1940F, 1940Q, 1940T, and 1940W, you can be sure that our pads will fit your steam mop to achieve the same excellent results. Our steam mop pads are also compatible with the PowerFresh 1440 series, PowerFresh Pet Scrubbing & Sanitizing 1940 series, PowerFresh Deluxe 1806 series, Power Steamer 3-in-1 steam mop, and handheld steam cleaner models such as 2685A, 35018, 35019, and 3501. For the PowerFresh Slim Steam Mop 2075 series, including 2075A and 2181, and the PowerFresh Pet Lift-Off Steam Mop 1540 series, you can rely on our steam mop pads for an efficient cleaning performance. Made of high-quality, durable, and machine-washable microfiber, our steam mop pads can easily trap and lift dirt, grime, and other particles from your floors and surfaces, leaving them spotless and hygienically clean. With their easy attachment system, you can easily replace your old or worn-out pads and get your steam mop up and running again. Try our steam mop pads today and experience the convenience and effectiveness of professional cleaning at home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the Bissell original pads!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second order of these replacement pads. They look IDENTICAL to the ones that came with my Bissell steam mop. They are easier to get on and off the mop, fit perfectly every time, and launder exactly the same. They do the job perfectly but cost considerably less money. Big savings!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These fit perfectly and are just like the one that came with the cleaner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work great and fit my machine well. Bissell 1042
reviews.reviewText: Fun getting out of the shrinkwrapped package, but everything was there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like having the extra steam pads so I can clean large areas and change my pad frequently as it gets filthy dirty. My floors look great when I take the time to steam mop them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pads work great and pick up so much more dirt than my last ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I found a Bissell Powerfresh steam mop at Goodwill in like-new condition, except it had no cleaning pads. After making sure that it worked, I took it home and did enough research to determine that it is a model 1940w. I considered the options for replacement pads and ended up buying these four "scrubbier" pads. They arrived promptly, fit perfectly, stay on snuggly and clean great. I cannot compare them to the originals, but I'm very happy with both the steam mop and the pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As Good as the Original
reviews.reviewText: Fit just like the ones that came with my Bissell steam mop. I use two of these to do the entire house, and they pick up plenty of dirt during a weekly cleaning. I prefer these with the embedded scrubbing strips over the plain cloth ones, as they seem to clean a bit better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit for Bissell Steam Mop
reviews.reviewText: Be sure to buy the Bissell compatible scent discs. The whole house will smell great!

reviews.reviewTitle: You only get the scrub pads
reviews.reviewText: I only wanted the scrub pads so this purchase was great without having to buy 2 of the plain pads which I don't need. They came air vaced which made package much lighter and less bulky.
The fit is perfect for my steam cleaner.
